title: Life in hot rain forests: Amazon Basin
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Amazon River Region

description: The climate factors that cause a tropical rain forest; how small communities of people of mixed Indian and Portuguese blood living along the Amazon river adapt themselves to this kind of environment. Views of a family tending their small garden, preparing meals, and gathering products from the forest for trade.
